Name: Udjat-eyes
Description: The udjat-eye depicts an open human eye to which some extra elements have been added. The amulet is connected with the celestial deity in the shape of a falcon and therefore also with the king. It is one of the most popular amulets and was not just used in the funerary cult.These udjat-eyes, made of light blue faience, probably date to the 18th Dynasty.
